title: Casting Spells
background:
A group of bandits has chased the party into a cave, where after about fifty metres of running they suddenly realise they're surrounded by total darkness and they don't know where next.

They can hear the bandit leader outside barking orders to a couple of his men to follow them and bring them out while the rest set up camp outside. Waiting for them to leave is not an option then.

**Sneaky Bob**, the party's [gnomish](+ancestry:gnomish) [rover](+background:rover) tries to use their brief moment of calm wisely...

start.text: I'm going to try to cast a [Lantern](+spell:lantern) spell!

next.text: What spell strength do you have in mind?
I reckon we're going to spend at least 4 hours bumbling around in this cave so let's make it **5**.
Okay, what's your [Nature Focus](+skill:nature_focus) skill level?
3, but hopefully we've got half a minute or so, so I'll [cast it slow](+action:cast-slow).
Alright, in that case your skill level counts as 1 higher.
And because Lantern is a level 0 spell, there's nothing to subtract from that, you'll need to roll `4d10!`!
*(Loud dice noises)* **18**, not gonna lie, this could've been better.
Don't worry, my dice aren't performing well today either. As you chose a spell strength of **5**, I will roll `5d10!` against your roll.

Small roll (<18).text: There you go, **15**, told you so. Your spell flickers into existence without any complications.

Mid-range roll (18-27).text: This is a **26**, how much did you roll,  **18**? Then the difference is **8**, which is less than **10**, therefore your spell will cost you 1 [Magic Force](+character:mp) if you'll take it.

next.text: *(Sharp intake of breath)* Of course I take it, what other choice I've got.
Then your spell is active now and please subtract **1** point of Magic Force!

Large roll (>27).text: I'm afraid this is **34** against your **18**. The difference is **16**, more than **10** but at least less than **20**, so your spell will cost you 2 points of [Magic Force](+character:mp) if you take it.

next.text: I've only got 1 point of Magic force.
Then the second point should come off your [Life Force](+character:ep).
Nah, I'm not going to sacrifice my health for a bit of blasted light, we'll hide here and try to ambush them, hope they bring a torch.
Fine but you've still spent 1 combat round with your attempt, you can already hear booted footsteps approaching!
